18.str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

18.str2: To look at, regard attentively, take heed, beware, consider. From skopos; to take aim at, i.e. regard.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

18.parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Neuter Plural
18.str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

18.parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Neuter Plural
18.str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

18.parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Neuter Plural
18.str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.
For a season, temporary. From pros and kairos; for the occasion only, i.e. Temporary.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

18.parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Neuter Plural
18.str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.
